### Data Summaries

#### My long term project, mental health data

#### NYS Vtal Health Statistics, Suicide Deaths by Age Group Race

#### https://health.data.ny.gov/Health/Vital-Statistics-Suicide-Deaths-by-Age-Group-Race-/j6fz-a4ta

```{.r .cell-code}
library(rio) # import/export any data
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'readxl' was built under R version 4.2.2
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
nys_suicide <- import("suicide_nys_region_2003.csv")

the_nys_data <-readr::read_csv("suicide_nys_region_2003.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Rows: 2561 Columns: 8
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): Region, RaceorEthnicity, Sex, AgeGroup
dbl (4): Year, FirearmDeaths, Alcohol-Related Deaths, SuicideDeaths

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(nys_suicide)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Rows: 2,561
Columns: 8
$ Year                     <int> 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 2015, 201…
$ Region                   <chr> "NYC", "NYC", "NYC", "NYC", "NYC", "NYC", "NY…
$ RaceorEthnicity          <chr> "Black Non Hispanic", "Black Non Hispanic", "…
$ Sex                      <chr> "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", "M", "F", …
$ AgeGroup                 <chr> "9-Jan", "9-Jan", "19-Oct", "19-Oct", "20-24"…
$ FirearmDeaths            <int> 1, 0, 2, 18, 0, 34, 4, 65, 2, 29, 0, 17, 2, 1…
$ `Alcohol-Related Deaths` <int> 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 10, 4, 9, 20, 34, 73, 58, 1…
$ SuicideDeaths            <int> 0, 0, 1, 4, 3, 9, 5, 20, 4, 6, 8, 16, 2, 4, 0…
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
spec(the_nys_data) #column data type
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
cols(
  Year = col_double(),
  Region = col_character(),
  RaceorEthnicity = col_character(),
  Sex = col_character(),
  AgeGroup = col_character(),
  FirearmDeaths = col_double(),
  `Alcohol-Related Deaths` = col_double(),
  SuicideDeaths = col_double()
)
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# comparing the three causes of death

mean(nys_suicide$`FirearmDeaths`)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 10.00234
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mean(nys_suicide$`Alcohol-Related Deaths`)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 56.44358
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mean(nys_suicide$`SuicideDeaths`)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 20.12886
```
:::
:::


#### Create a table of mean values of some data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
etoh_firearm_suicide <- summarise(nys_suicide,
                                  mean_Alcohol = mean(nys_suicide$`Alcohol-Related Deaths`),
                                  mean_firearm = mean(nys_suicide$FirearmDeaths),
                                  mean_suicide = mean(nys_suicide$SuicideDeaths)
)

etoh_firearm_suicide
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
  mean_Alcohol mean_firearm mean_suicide
1     56.44358     10.00234     20.12886
```
:::
:::


#### Visualize Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(nys_suicide, aes(x = RaceorEthnicity, y = SuicideDeaths))+
  geom_bin_2d()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_summaries_sixieme_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(nys_suicide, aes(x = RaceorEthnicity, y = FirearmDeaths))+
  geom_bin_2d()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](data_summaries_sixieme_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
nys_suicide$`Race or Ethnicity` != "Black Non Hispanic"
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
logical(0)
```
:::
:::
